verses.roman:
utsavānte gelā tiṅho kariyā prasāda
mora bhrātā-sane tāṅra kichu haila vāda

synonyms: utsava-ante—after the festival; gelā—went away; tiṅho—he; kariyā prasāda—showing mercy; mora—of me; bhrātā-sane—with the brother; tāṅra—of him; kichu—some; haila—there was; vāda—controversy.
translation: At the end of the festival Mīnaketana Rāmadāsa went away, offering his blessings to everyone. At that time he had some controversy with my brother.
